basics.name: Tsatsu Kofi Amable
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: I am an engineering professional who has a sound understanding of relational database technologies and tools in the microsoft office ecosystem. I have experience working with Relational Database Technologies and tools including Microsoft SQL Server, Python, Php, Java, Microsoft Office Access, among others. I have also worked with other technologies, ranging from cloud (Amazon Web Services) to geospatial information systems (GIS), systems administration (Linux & Windows) and content management systems.

location.address: #7 Nana Sika Street, Off Zibra Street, Pokuase Amanfrom GW1064

work.summary: Head of online presence for Ka Leo
highlights: Currently building tools (based on Google Sheets API, Facebook Messenger Bot API and proprietary code bases) for inhouse automated report generation to ease the burden on quality assurance and to improve operational efficiency and quality assurance across all inhouse systems. I am also engaged in additional work using LSTM networks to predict and isolate performance issues in the Rendezvous core platform.
Troubleshoot software, hardware and networking issues over the phone
Answer phone and email responses to the ITS Help Desk

volunteer.summary: The Akuakuenyehia Foundation is a not for profit organisation founded by the children of H.E. Judge Prof. Akua Kuenyehia, formerly of the International Criminal Court to assist financially constrained young women to pursue their educational/academic dreams
highlights: Held a writing clinic for 15 pre-university women
Was a camp facilitator and coach at the 2018 annual camp - for debate, CV and Personal Pitch clinics
Maintain custom data collection and storage infrastructure
Webmaster/IT Officer, IEEE Student Branch, UH Manoa, 2012-2013

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.
